title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Communications Regulation and
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Communications Regulation and
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Communications Regulation and 
Digital Hub Development Agency (Amendment) Act (Remuneration of 
Adjudicators) Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited communication regulation digital hub development agency (amendment) act (remuneration adjudicators) regulation 2023

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Communications Regulation and
heading: In these Regulations “Act of 2023” means the Communications
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Act of 2023” means the Communications 
Regulation and Digital Hub Development Agency (Amendment) Act 2023 
(No. 4 of 2023);
text_norm: 2 regulation act 2023 mean communication regulation digital hub development agency (amendment) act 2023 (no 4 2023)

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Communications Regulation and
heading: 3. The rate of remuneration of an adjudicator (within the meaning of
text_raw:
3. The rate of remuneration of an adjudicator (within the meaning of 

section 76 of the Act of 2023) shall be €1,000 per day.
text_norm: 3 rate remuneration adjudicator (within meaning section 76 act 2023) shall eur1 000 per day

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Communications Regulation and
heading: 4. The rate of remuneration of the Chief Adjudicator appointed under
text_raw:
4. The rate of remuneration of the Chief Adjudicator appointed under 

section 76(3) of the Act of 2023 shall be €1,250 per day. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

23 October, 2023. 

EAMONN RYAN, 

Minister for Communications, Climate Action and 
Environment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 27th October, 2023.
